sourcesContent:
import { SET_GAMER_NAME, BEGIN, END, HEAL } from '../action'
import { monsterArray } from '../utils'

const initialState = {
  level : 0,
  beeingPlaying : false,
  displayAnimation:false,
  monsterName: monsterArray[0],
  monsterPvMax: 100,
  monsterPv: 100,
  monsterManaMax: 100,
  monsterMana: 100,
  lvUPMonster : 100,
  messageMonster: '',
  gamerName:'',
  playerPvMax: 100,
  playerPv: 100,
  playerManaMax: 100,
  playerMana: 100,
  lvUpPlayer: 100,
  messagePlayer: '', 
};

const reducer = (state:any = initialState, action:any = {})  => {
  switch(action.type) {
    case SET_GAMER_NAME:
      return {
        ...state,
        gamerName : action.value
      }
    case BEGIN: 
     return {
       ...state, 
       beeingPlaying: true
     }
     case HEAL: 
      return {
        ...state,
        pv: state.playerPv + Math.floor(10 * ( state.lvUpPlayer) /100) >= state.playerMaxPv ? 
          state.playerMaxPv : 
          state.playerPv + Math.floor(10 * ( state.lvUpPlayer) /100),
        messagePlayer: state.playerPv + Math.floor(10 * ( state.lvUpPlayer) /100) >= state.playerMaxPv ? 
          state.playerMaxPv  - (state.playerPv + Math.floor(10 * ( state.lvUpPlayer) /100)) : 
          state.playerPv + Math.floor(10 * ( state.lvUpPlayer) /100)
      }
     case END :
       return {
         ...state,
         level : 0,
         gamerName:'',
         monsterName: monsterArray[0],
         beeingPlaying : false,
         displayAnimation:false,
         monsterPvMax: 100,
         monsterPv: 100, 
         playerPvMax: 100,
         playerPv: 100,
         monsterManaMax: 100,
         monsterMana: 100, 
         playerManaMax: 100,
         playerMana: 100, 
       }
    default: return state
  }
}
export default reducer
